titles.title: A bill to amend section 3524 of title 18, United States Code, to modify the provisions with respect to visitation rights of parents whose children are relocated under the witness protection program.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 10/1/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to modify provisions concerning visitation rights of parents whose children are relocated under the witness protection program to: (1) apply parent notification requirements with respect to custody or visitation of a child under a Federal court order; (2) eliminate limitations on reasonable costs payable by the Department of Justice, for visitation as provided under a court order; and (3) ensure protection of the right of the parent and child to privacy during such visitation.
